author: John Binder, John Binder
title: Vulture Investors Using Coronavirus Carnage to Wipe Out Small Business
description: Private equity firms are reportedly using the Chinese coronavirus pandemic as an opportunity to cheaply buy up businesses, which will have a crippling impact on America's small business owners.
content:
Private equity firms are reportedly using the Chinese coronavirus pandemic as an opportunity to cheaply buy up businesses, which will have a crippling impact on America’s small business owners.
While small and medium-sized businesses struggle to stay afloat … [+3345 chars]
